subject: Update documentation
description:
**Type:** Task

**Description:** Ensure all JSDoc documentation is complete and follows project standards. Update any markdown files if needed.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] JSDoc preambles on source and test files
- [ ] Function docs with `@param`, `@returns`, `@throws`, `@remarks`, `@example`
- [ ] Documentation focuses on "why" not "what" per jsdoc-best-practices

**Skills to Invoke:** `/jsdoc-best-practices`

**Verification:**
- Type: `documentation`
- Command: `grep -c '@param\|@returns\|@throws\|@remarks\|@example' src/utils/fibonacci.ts`
- Expected: Multiple JSDoc tags present (count > 10)

```json
{"plan":"fibonacci-generator-rewrite","type":"task","skills":["/jsdoc-best-practices"],"verification":{"type":"documentation","command":"grep -c '@param\\|@returns\\|@throws\\|@remarks\\|@example' src/utils/fibonacci.ts","expected":"Count > 10 (multiple JSDoc tags)"}}
```

learnings: The fibonacci module documentation was already comprehensive from implementation. Only change needed was updating the test file preamble to remove 'TDD RED phase' which was misleading after implementation was complete.
